intro: Lachnophyllum, commonly known as the silverleaf shrub, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its silver-gray foliage, which results from dense pubescence covering the leaves. Lachnophyllum species are valued for their ornamental appeal and ecological roles in supporting local wildlife.
